__e: I guess I thought that maybe you'd come here... I don't know, to give me something, information. Something that would help make sense of what I was afraid you'd become.
I know I always said you would come here one day, and you will, you will, I swear it.

It just never occurred to me that you'd come home, I guess.
Didn't know when you'd be home, so I, uh... brought you some clothes.
You were coming out here till Labor Day, helping fix the place up, and then come home.
On the phone you keep saying you'll visit me.
Well, but you'd come to visit me in jail, right?
I was certain you'd come visit me this morning.

I mean that after 12 years, the woman you wouldn't come work here without is now working for someone else.
